name: RelaxingTrainJourney
0:
”Alexa, open Relaxing Train Journey”
”Alexa, start Relaxing Train Journey”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxing train journey
des:
Relaxing Train Journey is a skill that plays an audio recording of a Siberian train journey. 

This soothing train sound with its rhythmicity is recommended for relaxation, meditation, study, and sleep.

By default, the sound will play until you stop it. To stop the music, say "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."

Please leave a 5-star review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at founders@getstoryline.com. Your 5-star reviews encourage us to keep making more great sounds skills!
